name: Unauthorised 401
description:
The year is 2084.

You are Rewindman - a greatest hacker of all times. Your goal is to get The Floppy of Time, a secret artifact, that is locked safely on a well defended server. Grab your sunglasses and Power Glove! It is time to hack some time.

Tricks up your sleeve: 

  • 'E' - Rewind. Let the time flow backwards for a short amount of time;
  • 'Right Mouse Button' - Timestop. Lets you freeze time in a chosen area;
  • 'Q' - Shield. Lets you stop and deflect enemies' bullets;
  • 'Spacebar' - Dash. A simple trick to take a better position.

Every skill requires 'Tapes', which can be dropped by your foes.

This is a submission to Brackeys 2020.2 game jam.

This is a bullet-hell-like game, where you have to fight you way through several arenas and fight the boss in the end.

Credits:

  • Tileset - by https://raou.itch.io/free-dungeon-mini-tileset ;
  • Main menu music - Vitaliy Samoylov;
  • Art, coding, game design, playtesting, having no sleep - Roman Paramonov.
